name: The Adventures of Rapha in Zombie Defense
name_original: The Adventures of Rapha in Zombie Defense
description:
This is a survival game where you have to shoot zombies and collect money to buy weapons and get skulls to improve your defense.

it may still have some bugs, you can have a look at my source code here:

GitHub

Controls:

W and S move Rapha

Space or Shoot Icon = Shoot

M (in game) = mute/unmute song

A and D = Change weapon

Zombies name:

DeviantArt
